recipesJson.name: Yes, We Strawberry Cheesecake (Live Mixing)
recipesJson.author: ENYAWREKLAW
recipesJson.description:
One of the most accurate portrayals of strawberry cheesecake, thanks to INW's Yes, We Cheesecake

Made on (Live Mixing: DIYorDIE 2.0)

reviews.text: So what we have here is failure to finish my 60ml bottle of NY Cheesecake. This is the go to cheescake flavor that all other cheesecakes aspire to be and with FW Yogurt it is elevated even further. I have tried this recipe as is and swapped out strawberry for a variety of fruits such as blueberry, banana, and lemon. All with the same level of satisfaction as the last. This is a true "plug and play" recipe that just keeps on giving. I can't wait to try adding chocolates to the mix. Great Job!!
Very easy recipe for a good cheesecake.  I prefer JF sweet strawberry at around 4% over the cap, but either way is good.

The best strawberry cheesecake! I really tasted strawberry cheesecake instead of the usual strawberry with graham cracker or cream but not an actual cheesecake. This hit the nail on the head! Fantastic!

this is great, love this cheesecake. Dense and creamy on the inhale strawberries on the exhale with the graham note that stick in your mouth.
Best cheesecake for now.
This is very easy and delicious.
